classes.load_user(id)[source]¶

routes.analysis_reports_()[source]¶

Placeholder for page for upcoming features.

routes.dashboard_()[source]¶

DashBoard page: With a listing ID as an input given by authenticated user, Outputs charts with : Overall Reliability, Reviews Reliability, Reviewer Reliability, Host Reliability as scores, Number of Fraud Reviewers, Number of Host Cancellations, Average Review Sentiment Scores of the latest 4 months, Average Ratings Scores of the latest 4 months, Listing Availability of the latest 4 months, Number of Positive, Neutral and Negative Reviews.

routes.display_n_listing_(max_listing)[source]¶

Displays map with the the given number of listings.

routes.index_()[source]¶

Index page: Renders about.html with team member names and project description

routes.login_()[source]¶

Login page: Renders login.html with submit form for username and password

routes.logout_()[source]¶

Logout page: Unauthorized server error (expected)

routes.page_not_found(e)[source]¶

Error handling for 404 error.

routes.register_()[source]¶

Register page: Renders register.html with sign up form asking for username, email, and password
